ai-tika-vin02t1:2_1: You should confess an offense entailing acknowledgment, thinking: ‘This is the first suspended.’”
ai-tika-vin02t1:2_4: When there are unsuitable periods—someone else who is fully ordained and who is standing in inhabited areas—shriveled the hands and feet, both the five hundred and five factors.
ai-tika-vin02t1:3_1: He should not speak in inhabited areas; he may eat in the second part of the five factors.
ai-tika-vin02t1:4_0: if, without being sick and without first being invited, he eats in one house and non-staple food after personally receiving it from that family, except for those who are sick, and who have eaten by the meal.
ai-tika-vin02t1:6_0: The training rule on acknowledgment is finished.
ai-tika-vin02t1:7_0: The chapter on offenses entailing acknowledgment is finished.
